name: The Beyond (QM Studios, KeikakuDorito, IbeAbdulla, angelina_01, CarW)
name_original: The Beyond (QM Studios, KeikakuDorito, IbeAbdulla, angelina_01, CarW)
description: The Beyond is a 2D horror fighting platformer that will take the player deep into the world inside the mind of the main character only known to most as The Wolf.  As The Wolf, players will have to try and escape the nightmare world of The Beyond while fighting off different ghouls and monsters of a shattered childhood. As the player progresses they must pick up journal pages to find different pieces of The Wolf’s abilities. In the end, it's up to the player to make it out of this nightmare alive. Are you up for the task?
